name: Christmas Is Canceled
description:
The Christmas holiday is upon the wintery Scandinavian countryside, and you've been tasked by your mother with preparing the sausages for the festivities. Unbeknownst to her though, the Yule Lads of lore are more than just bed time stories, and some of them have arrived to frustrate your sausage preparation duties.
(Made in two weeks for Wizard Jam 6 - Winter 2017)
